name: One Blazing Breakup (beta)
description:
Amelia, aka the legendary superhero Blizzard, is breaking up with her longtime datemate, Shay, aka Blaze.  At this point, life couldn't be harder.  Hear her point of view on the whole situation.

This game is a beta.  Not all the art and music is here yet.  

Leave your feedback for the team and let us know what you think!
